name: places/ChIJ8coCoMVYwokRRrPTxtaqrmQ
formattedAddress: 570 Main St, New York, NY 10044, USA
adrFormatAddress: 570 Main St, New York, NY 10044, USA

originalText.text: I have explored all seven continents and experienced customer service from people all around the globe. I felt so fortunate to be pampered today by Tania at ND Nails Spa. I have never ever received such a caring, gentle, and heartfelt manicure. Tania truly took her time and gave such a meaningful, intricate detailed manicure. She followed up with a massage as well that relieved so much stress as I newly moved to Roosevelt Island. Luis was so kind as he greeted me. Ninfa offered me the card for the salon the previous day. Although they were incredibly busy yesterday, she warmly welcomed me and encouraged me to make an appointment or come back later. I’m so glad that I came just as they opened and received top tier service. If you’re looking for a sweet oasis and a little getaway, stop by ND Nails Spa. They are truly extraordinary. The place is extremely clean, they are courteous, and careful to make you feel like you truly belong. Thank you to the stellar staff. I left feeling lighter and brighter. Your care truly makes a difference. I look forward to coming back for even more delight.

originalText.text: While the environment is clean and all the nail techs are friendly, I was ultimately dissatisfied with my experience. I was removing my acrylics and they had my nails sitting in acetone for more than an hour (which is unusual in my experience). The result has been extremely weak nails. It has been about 1 week and my nails continue to chip

I was removing my acrylics and they had my nails sitting in acetone for more than an hour (which is unusual in my experience). The result has been extremely weak nails. It has been about 1 week and my nails continue to chip

originalText.text:
I went here last 05/28/22 had my gel nails done here because of its convenient location based from where I lived. Cynthia was nice and all but I couldn’t fathom how she would decide for me and insisted the color she wanted (transparent looking color) instead of the one I picked (opaque grayish blue). She literally insisted couple of times and I tried liking it but it looks horrible and unfinished and 3 days later, IT STARTED PEELING OFF ALREADY. I also told her the thumb has hair on it but SHE IGNORED IT!
I came back (06/02/22) to had it fixed to my liking. She wouldn’t allow me to pick something I want AGAIN!! I immediately emphasized to her I didn’t pay for something I’m not satisfied with! She let me pick the color but everything they have is either dried out or transparent looking! I ended up having white colored nail but the quality of the service is HORRIBLE!
IT IS NOT WORTH $60!

originalText.text: My first time visiting this nail salon since moving to the island. Cynthia was so kind and did an amazing job! She did exactly what I asked for. They soaked off my previous gel manicure very nicely and thoroughly so that there was no damage to my natural nail. She took her time and my nails came out beautiful. Will definitely be back!!

text.text: My first time visiting this nail salon since moving to the island. Cynthia was so kind and did an amazing job! She did exactly what I asked for. They soaked off my previous gel manicure very nicely and thoroughly so that there was no damage to my natural nail. She took her time and my nails came out beautiful. Will definitely be back!!

originalText.text: So many issues here. I want to say that it seems to be a very nice crew here at this nail salon but my feet got done today at 4:44 and it looked like this immediately while I was sitting still in the chair. Also very unsanitary my nail tech literally shared tools with the next nail tech beside her to help complete both me and the elder that was getting her feet done at the same time in a world of this pandemic is really unexceptionable I hope they do better and to know they they have been here since 1999 and don’t have enough equipment to service two different patron is very sad
